text: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

text: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Think positive and positive things will happen.
author: Anonymous

text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Unknown

text: Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

text: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown

text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

text: To be successful, you must accept all challenges that come your way. You can't just accept the ones you like.
author: Mike Gafka

text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

text: Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Unknown

text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

text: The harder you work, the more luck you seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Anonymous

text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

text: Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it's inspiring.
author: Unknown

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

text: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
author: Unknown

text: To be successful, you must act big, think big, and talk big.
author: Aristotle Onassis

text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

text: Little things make big days. Great things take time. Be patient.
author: Unknown

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

text: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
author: Colin R. Davis

text: Your only limit is your mind.
author: Unknown

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

text: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
author: Unknown

text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
author: Aisha Tyler

text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Unknown

text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

text: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
author: Wilson Kanadi

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

text: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

text: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: You do not find the happy life. You make it.
author: Camilla E. Kimball

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
author: Unknown
